<br><br>![](about_img.jpg){width=350px}<p style="font-size: 22px; text-align:left">Hi, I'm Aspen. <br><br> 
My innate curiosity, flair for creativity, and natural tendency toward structure and logic have paved the way for my career in data. Blending seamlessly with my proficiencies in Python, SQL, Tableau, Pandas, Excel, VBA, JavaScript, D3, HTML, CSS, and PySpark (to name a few), I am a natural problem solver, process improver, and  critical thinker. After a meticulous six month Data Analytics course through UC Berkeley, teaching myself how to build my own website from scratch as a personal endeavor, and the various analytics/coding projects and visualizations I've undertaken to build my personal repertoire, I am ready to take root in a long term role where I can contribute my experience and skillset in a meaningful way.</p>
